article: russian president vladimir putin and his brazilian counterpart fernando henrique cardoso sighed a joint statement here monday to strengthen their countries ' cooperation in a bid to advance bilateral ties to a level of long - term strategic partnership .
abstract: russia brazil sign joint statement on cooperation
candidates: russian president vladimir putin and his brazilian counterpart fernando henrique cardoso made a joint statement here monday.
the two presidents of russia and brazil have agreed to strengthen cooperation.
the two leaders said they wanted to advance bilateral ties to a level of long - term strategic partnership.
